description: Transform the TypeScript/Node.js AI Recruitment Clerk into a best practices Java application with DDD, CQRS, SOLID, and SSOT patterns using modular monolithic architecture.

userStories.title: Set up Java project structure with modular monolith architecture
userStories.description: Create the foundational Java project structure following modular monolith principles with Maven/Gradle multi-module setup, clear bounded context boundaries, and dependency inversion between modules.
acceptanceCriteria: Define bounded context modules: candidate-context, job-context, scoring-context, reporting-context, user-context, shared-kernel
Set up Java 21+ with Spring Boot 3.x as base framework
Configure module dependencies enforcing dependency direction (shared-kernel at bottom)
Create README documenting module structure and dependency rules
mvn clean install succeeds with all modules

userStories.notes: SSOT for all domain building blocks
